node.html: A simple decentralized todo application built using Wagmi, RainbowKit and Ethers.js library. The contract owner can deploy the contract and then add or complete tasks.
A taxi booking system built in PHP which uses the google maps and geolocation API to show the destination route and estimated travelling time to the users.

frontmatter.title: Boston USA Spoken English Institute Website

node.html: Developed the website for Boston USA Institute of Spoken English with a feature to book a free demo class in the institute. Website is developed using gatsby static site generator on top of react in the frontend.
